AifsArmed.Description: If this field is true, AIFS flow is triggered

AifsSignatureIdList.Description: List of signature Id which has AIFS flow enabled

DisableAifsResetOnSyncfloodCounter.Description: Disable AIFS Reset on syncflood counter

DramCeccPollingEn.Description: If this field is true, Dynamic Random Accecc Memory Error Correction Code (DRAM ECC) correctable errors will be polled

DramCeccThresholdEn.Description: If this field is true, error thresholding for DRAM ECC correctable errors will be enabled

DramCeccPollingPeriod.Description: Polling interval in seconds for DRAM ECC correctable errors

DramCeccErrThresholdCnt.Description: Error threshold count for DRAM ECC correctable errors

McaPollingEn.Description: If this field is true, Machine Check Architecture (MCA) correctable errors will be polled

McaThresholdEn.Description: If this field is true, error thresholding for MCA errors will be enabled

McaPollingPeriod.Description: Polling interval in seconds for MCA errors

McaErrThresholdCnt.Description: Error threshold count for MCA errors

PcieAerPollingEn.Description: If this field is true, PCI Express Advanced Error Reporting (PCIE AER) correctable errors will be polled

PcieAerThresholdEn.Description: If this field is true, error thresholding for PCIE AER errors will be enabled

PcieAerPollingPeriod.Description: Polling interval in seconds for PCIE AER errors

PcieAerErrThresholdCnt.Description: Error threshold count for PCIE AER errors
